snippet: The president of a poultry processing company and its general manager have been arrested in the factory fire that killed at least 120 people and injured at least 77 others this week.
abstract: Officials in China's Jilin Province arrest Jia Yushan and Zhang Yushen in connection with fire in poultry factory fire that killed at least 120 people and injured at least 77 others.
lead_paragraph: The president of a poultry processing company and its general manager have been arrested in the factory fire that killed at least 120 people and injured at least 77 others this week.

headline.main: China: Arrests in Poultry Factory Fire
headline.print_headline: China: Arrests in Poultry Factory Fire
